title.rendered: 2022 World Cup in Qatar Group Stage Travel Packages

content.rendered:
2022 World Cup in Qatar VIP Group Stage Packages

Experience the 2022 World Cup in Qatar exactly the way you want to. Roadtrips’ Group Stage Packages allow you to personalize your itinerary to make it absolutely perfect for you. Your fully customizable 2022 World Cup package includes match day experiences during any of the 48 group stage matches, first class accommodations in some of Doha’s top hotels, a personalized meet-and-greet upon arrival, daily breakfast, transfers, high-touch service from our 24/7 on-site host team plus much more.

Right from opening kick-off, Doha will be the place to be during the 2022 World Cup. Our group stage packages are based in this incredible city to provide our guests with the ultimate World Cup experience. Centrally located with easy access to all the stadiums plus all of the urban conveniences, Doha and its wonderful luxury accommodations make the perfect home base for this incredible event.

Complete 7-night 2022 World Cup Group Stage Packages start at $10,775 per person. To get started planning your 2022 World Cup experience, contact one of our Sports Travel Specialists at 1-800-465-1765 or submit a Custom Trip Quote request.
